name: Saccharomyces Ferment 30% Milky Toner
about: What it is:A gentle, exfoliating milky toner, suitable for sensitive skin, that promotes a smoother, brighter complexion while boosting hydration..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dark Spots, Dullness, and Uneven Texture.Highlighted Ingredients:- Saccharomyces Ferment 30% Containing Fermented N-Acetylglucosamine 3%: Encourages surface exfoliation to visibly smooth uneven texture..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also gluten-free and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:An alternative exfoliator suitable for sensitive skin, the Saccharomyces Ferment 30% Milky Toner uses fermented N-acetyl glucosamine to create a gentle, hydrating formula with the exfoliating benefits of a direct acid..Clinical Results:In a clinical study, results showed:
ingredients: -Saccharomyces Ferment 30% Containing Fermented N-Acetylglucosamine 3%: Encourages surface exfoliation to visibly smooth uneven texture..-Squalane: Hydrates, softening skin and providing barrier support...Aqua (Water), Yeast Extract, Squalane, Lauryl Glucoside, Myristyl Glucoside, Polyglyceryl-6 Laurate, Isoceteth-20, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Citric Acid, Sodium Citrate, Sodium Hydroxide, Phenoxyethanol, Chlorphenesin.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply in the morning and evening..-Apply to your face and neck using a cotton pad or your fingers..-Do not rinse off..-Avoid eye contour and contact with eyes.
